alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Greene; Martin; Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 9:14AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Greene, Pitt, southwestern Martin and northwestern Beaufort Counties through 945 AM EST... At 914 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Snow Hill to 8 miles southeast of Fremont to Goldsboro. Movement was east at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Winterville, Williamston, Farmville, Bethel, Stokes, Snow Hill, Bell Arthur, Robersonville, Pactolus, House, Bruce, Maury, Lizzie, Pitt Greenville Airport, Dowdy Ficklen Stadium, East Carolina University, Fountain, Simpson and Castoria. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM EST for eastern North Carolina.
